Package com.se.goBears.controller

Class ReservationController

java.lang.Object
com.se.goBears.controller.ReservationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/reservation") @CrossOrigin(origins="*") public class ReservationController extends Object
This controller class handles the API requests for room reservations. It handles request to reserve a room, get all reservation for a room, get all reservation by a user, get all reservations information and cancel a reservation. Admin request for reservation acceptance, decline and archive are also handled by the controller.

    • reserveRoom

      @PostMapping("/room/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity reserveRoom​(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody com.se.goBears.entity.Reservations reservations) throws Exception
      This method accepts a room id and a reservation body and creates the requested reservation if all the dates criteria are matched.
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the room to be associated to the reservation.
      reservations - is the request reservation to be created for the room.
      Returns:
      room object with associated reservation details.
      Throws:
      Exception - if a reservation conflict occurs.
      See Also:
      RoomReservationService
